title: Retention policy on 'Archive' messages
content:
I've been making regular use of the Archive feature, which turns out to have been a mistake. When the message is archived, the default behavior is apparently, to organize the messages in sub-folders under the main Archive folder. Come to find out, the Archive folder has its retention policy set to 'Don't delete any messages', but all the sub-folders are set to 'Use my account settings'. End result - almost all my archived messages are gone.

I would call this a bug. The sub-folders should inherit the retention policy of the parent folder. Going forward - is there a way to set this, so I don't have to continually monitor the Archive folders and manually set the retention policy every time a new sub-folder is created??? OR -- my preference would be to have the archived messages NOT organized into sub-folders. Is there a way to turn this off?

Thank you.
